md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 21 He Was Only Twelve - Part 1
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: Tragedy strikes when James, who is traveling with Charles, Albert and Mr. Edwards to Sleepy Eye--is shot during a brutal bank robbery.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: Tragedy strikes when James, who is traveling with Charles, Albert and Mr. Edwards to Sleepy Eye--is shot during a brutal bank robbery. When James slips into a coma, Charles goes with Mr. Edwards and Albert to track down the criminals and bring them to justice.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: Tragedy strikes when James, who is traveling with Charles, Albert and Mr. Edwards to Sleepy Eye--is shot during a brutal bank robbery. When James slips into a coma, Charles goes with Mr. Edwards and Albert to track down the criminals and bring them to justice.
